name: sFight
description:
The game is still under development. 

Controls:

  • P    Pause
  • Esc   Back

Player1:

  • W A D       To Move/Jump
  • Space        To Attack

Player2:

  • Arrows              To Move/Jump 
  • Right ctrl          To Attack 

Fight in this small 2D platform against your friends or relatives. Have fun destroying one of the three characters, each of which has a unique feature.
